answers.answer: Once again, these are things I would get checked out by your physician.  They may or may not be an indication of diabetes, but either way, they warrant diagnosis and treatment. Good Luck to you.  Let us know what the doctor says.Es

question: I also forgot to add that when my hands went numb they also locked up and I couldn't move them. My boyfriend tried to push my fingers down and help me and they would go back to the curled position.  It worries me and him.
title: cant move hands
